title: The Spanking
description: Sometimes you just need a good spanking.Since her divorce, Cassie has spent the last two year getting back on her feet. The last thing she needed was another man to come into her life and tell her what to do. But when Jordan, her ex-husband’s best friend from school shows up, he makes her realize that there may be a few things she needs that she just cannot get on her own. When he offers to give her a good spanking, strictly as friends, no sex included, she cannot resist the offer. But things don’t go exactly as they had planned. This book is for adult’s reading pleasure only as it contains steamy descriptions of sex, anal sex and other sexual acts. Safe, no cheating, and an HEA guaranteed.
author: Sara Bryer
